name: Vein Racer
description:
CONTROLLER SUPPORTED!  :)

Do you like racing?  Do you like Veins???

WELL DO YOU!!??

 You'll LOVE Vein Racer Then!

Vein Racer is about a blood-cell race track inside a vein network.

Eat colored cell like things to go faster!

But don't eat too many of one color tho!  You need a balanced diet!
